alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 2:02PM CDT until May 12 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 202 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Brockton, or 8 miles northwest of Enterprise, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Enterprise, Fort Rucker, New Brockton, Richburg, Mixons Crossroads, Victoria, Eanon, Lowry Mill, Clintonville, Shell Army Field, Tabernacle, Camp Alaflo Bsa, Arcus and Woodland Grove Church. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
